title: P0-A: Strict parser/export correctness
description: Enforce fail-fast behavior for malformed templates/exports and remove silent semantic drops.
acceptance-tests: Parser strictness tests; export negative-path tests

title: P0-B: Public access and tier filtering hardening
description: Harden anonymous/public endpoints with deny-by-default and published-only exposure.
acceptance-tests: Public access isolation and tenant-boundary tests

title: P1-A: Revision provenance completeness
description: Ensure template provenance is present and preserved across all revision creation/update/publish flows.
acceptance-tests: Provenance path unit tests and router serialization checks

title: P1-B: Refresh API contract + frontend parity
description: Standardize refresh counters and support metadata across backend + frontend contracts.
acceptance-tests: Template refresh contract tests; frontend typecheck

title: P1-C: Dynamic form fidelity improvements
description: Close relationship/entity/list rendering and validation gaps in editor flows.

title: P1-D: End-to-end conformance CI gate
description: Automate full refresh->create/edit->publish->export->round-trip verification pipeline in CI.

title: P2-A: Unsupported template lifecycle UX
description: Display support state clearly and disable unsupported/unrefreshable templates with reasons.
acceptance-tests: UI behavior tests for disabled/unavailable templates

title: P2-B: Deep AASX semantic validation
description: Extend validation beyond ZIP/manifest to semantic IDs, qualifiers, and value-type integrity.
